imdb.plot outline: Eye candy can't get any better than The Blue Hill American Show. Four beautiful women travel the cities of the USA giving badly styled men the make-over of their life. The ultra hot women review every man product there is and give their womanly opinion. Known fact 100% of men out there take style advice from hot chicks. This is a show for real men that can't dress. GO USA!
